articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Calling all Devs - you can earn up to $2,500 by participating in this thread-writing contest presented by @fleekxyz ⚡️
Ideas to thread about:
- Whitepaper TLDR explainers 
- Benefits/use cases explainers 
- Ideas for potential services  
Learn more here 👇

Fleek ⚡️: ⚡@fleekxyz Thread Contest ⚡
The new @fleek_net decentralized edge whitepaper just dropped, and to celebrate we’re putting up a contest for the best reactions 🎉!
1. Make a Twitter thread about Fleek Network.
2. Compete for $5000 in ETH prizes.
Wanna join? Hop in 👇

The new changes will position them as a platform for building almost any performant cloud or blockchain infrastructure.
